name: Red Comrades 2: For the Great Justice. Reloaded
description: Sequel to the amazing adventures of two Russian pop-culture legends: Vasily Ivanovich Chapaev and his fellow aide Petka who fearlessly beat off the alien invasion in a first franchise installment.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Процессор: 2.2 GHz processor Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Video 512 MB RAM DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 3 GB

reviews.review_text: played this a lot back then awesome game :3
